name: store-ratings-api
description: Express API for user auth, stores, and ratings (PostgreSQL)

scripts.db:schema: sh -c "docker compose exec -T -e PGPASSWORD=postgres db psql -U postgres -d store_ratings < schema.sql"
scripts.db:seed: sh -c "docker compose exec -T -e PGPASSWORD=postgres db psql -U postgres -d store_ratings < seed.sql"
